name: Power-Up brothers
description:
Hello and welcome to Power-up Brothers!

Best downloaded but if you cant download for some reason the webgl is there (Just put in mind to make it full screen and esc doesnt pause the game but you can click the pause button in the corner)

Just to make this clear this is a 2 player game!

In this game you have to fight off the enemies and get to the end of the level without dying! This is a 2 player game because this game was made for the brackeys game jam 2021!

Use WASD and space bar to shoot for player 1 and use the arrow keys and left mouse to shoot for player 2.

There will be several levels and the only task is to get to the end of the level! After you've done all the levels you have won! 

You can collect coins from enemies as a reward.

And that's basically it! 

Art, UI and some coding by usenowgamer,

Most coding by Fishbigger.

Music from  HeatleyBros
